info.title: HitHorizons
info.description: HitHorizons enables you to work with data of 75M+ European companies from 60 countries directly in your Microsoft products. Enrich you software with company data from various sources to provide you with a more complete and complex picture of the market, individual companies and their evolution over time.

get.summary: Retrieve company detail data by ID

parameters.name: HitHorizonsId
parameters.description: HitHorizons ID of the company to retrieve. HitHorizonsId can be retrieved by searching for the company using Company-Search or Company-SearchUnstructured operations.
parameters.x-ms-summary: ID of the company to retrieve

get.description: Retrieve data of company specified by HitHorizonsId.

get.summary: Search for companies using structured query

parameters.name: DUNSNumber
parameters.description: Company with the provided DUNS Number will be returned.

parameters.name: CompanyName
parameters.x-ms-summary: Value to search in company names
parameters.description: Company name and secondary name will be searched for this value.

parameters.name: NationalId
parameters.x-ms-summary: Value to search in company National ID
parameters.description: National ID will be searched for this value.

parameters.name: AddressUnstructured
parameters.x-ms-summary: Value to search in company address
parameters.description: Company address will be searched for this value. All address fields will be searched (street address, postal code, city, state/province). When country name is present in this field, the results are limited only to the given country. Any of the terms can be present in any of the address fields.

parameters.name: AddressStreet
parameters.x-ms-summary: Value to search in company street address
parameters.description: Company street address will be searched for this value. All terms must be present in either one of the street address lines.

parameters.name: City
parameters.x-ms-summary: Value to search in company city
parameters.description: Company city will be searched for this value. All terms must be present in city name.

parameters.name: StateProvince
parameters.x-ms-summary: Value to search in company state/province
parameters.description: Company state/province will be searched for this value. All terms must be present in state/province name.

parameters.name: Country
parameters.x-ms-summary: Country to limit the search in
parameters.description: Only companies in the given country will be searched.

parameters.name: ShowBranches
parameters.x-ms-summary: Whether to include branch records in results
parameters.description: When false (default), only main offices and single-location companies are retrieved. When true, also records marked as branch offices are included in the results.

parameters.name: CompanyTypes
parameters.x-ms-summary: Company types to be included in the results
parameters.description: Array of company types to search for. This value can be provided as a comma-separated list of values, instead of an array of values (i.e. CompanyTypes=3,13 , instead of CompanyTypes=3&CompanyTypes=13) Refer to the following codelist for available values: https://hithorizonsapim.portal.azure-api.net/api-docs/code-lists#companyType . When not provided, the following values are used by default: 0, 3, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 100, 102, 107, 120, 151, 154, 160, 167

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: Max number of results to return. Default value is 20. Maximum possible value is 100.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Max number of results to return

get.summary: Search for companies using unstructured query

parameters.name: Ids
parameters.x-ms-summary: Value to search in company IDs: HitHorizonsId, DUNSNumber and NationalId
parameters.description: All available IDs will be searched for the values in this field: HitHorizons ID, DUNS Number and National ID. Multiple values can be provided, separated by space.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.x-ms-summary: Value to search in company names and company IDs
parameters.description: Company name and secondary name will be searched for this value. Also, NationalId will be searched. If the format corresponds to the HitHorizonsId (starts with H-), HitHorizonsId will be searched. This field can be used for broad search using names and IDs for user convenience.
